entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS EARLY THIS EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT

SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
